シリウスシュガーに、ある生徒４名の訓練指導を\nお願いしたいと考えています。:
I'll give Sirius Sugaru the training instruction of four students.
I'd like to ask for your help.
『特別養成校舎』――チーム『プレ・クラス－Ａ』。\nいくつかある『プレ・クラス』:
“Special Training School Building”—Team Pre-Class A
Of a few Pre-Classes, they're students belonging to Team A.
それぞれ名前は『ジュリー・ステイシー』『黒森ラウラ』\n『樋向心香』『ノエル・ア:
Their names were “Julie Stacy” and “Laura Kuromori.”
It's called 'Himukai Shinko' or 'Noel Arue.'
特別養成校舎……確か練度不足などいろんな問題から、正式に\nパイロットになれなか:
A special training building... If I'm not mistaken, due to various problems like lack of training, it's official.
It's a retraining building where students who couldn't become pilots are sent back once, right?
先日あなた方が発見した新ルートですが、調査の結果、\n想定以上の資源が眠っている:
About the new route you discovered the other day, the results of your investigation
It has been confirmed that there are more resources than expected.
それを受けて、学園全体でメイズ探索が活性化し、\nパイロット人員の増強が求められ:
Accepting that, the entire school’s search for Mayse activated
We need to increase the number of pilots.
それで、プレ・クラス－Ａの生徒達を鍛え上げ、可能なら\n正規のパイロットとして運:
With that, I’ll train the Pre-Class-A students, if possible
You want to be a proper pilot, don't you?
具体的には、メイズ浅層における実地訓練を\nお願いしたいと考えています。:
Specifically, I’d like to give you some field training in the shallow levels of the Maze
I'd like to ask for your help.
以前カラフルブーケのうるうや舞亜が俺らにしてくれたようなことを、\n今度はこっち:
The colorful bouquet Uru and Maia had done for us before
So this time, I'll be the one doing it to the other girls...
そう思うと、シリウスシュガーの皆も評価されるように\nなってきたのだと嬉しくなる:
The thought made everyone in Sirius Sugaru appreciate it as well
It makes me happy that I'm starting to get used to it.
（それに教えるということ自体が、彼女達の成長にも繋がる……\n悪くない話だ）:
(Besides, teaching them would also help them grow...)
Not a bad story.)
ちなみに訓練の結果、プレ・クラス－Ａの生徒が\n正規パイロットに認定された場合、:
By the way, as a result of the training, a Pre-Class-A student
If you are certified as a full-fledged pilot, you will be compensated for your success based on the number of people you have.
会長がスマートデバイスの画面をこちらに見せる。\n俺と七彩はそこに表示された金額:
Pres shows me the smart device screen.
Shichika and I were surprised by the amount displayed there.
これだけあれば、\n当面はチームの資金に困ることはなくなりますわね……:
With this much,
We won't have to worry about the team's funds for the time being...
問題は、そのプレ・クラス－Ａの子達が、\n現時点でどれくらい『できる』のかだな。:
The problem is, those Pre-Class-A kids...
I wonder how much I can do at this point.
特別養成校舎の中では、『エース』と呼ばれる４人だそうですよ。: There are apparently four people in the special training building called 'Aces.'
へえ、ならそんなに手がかからないってことか。: Huh, so that means it won't take that long.
けど、なんで俺達なんだ？\n他にも適役はいるだろう。カラフルブーケとか。:
But why us?
I'm sure there's someone else who's fit for the role. Like a colorful bouquet.
あなたは落ちこぼれと評されたシリウスシュガーを、\n見事に立て直しました。:
You took Sirius Sugaru, who was described as a washout
I've recovered splendidly.
さらに先日は未知のルートを発見し、\nメイズシフターの襲撃に遭いながらも無事に帰:
Furthermore, the other day, they had discovered an unknown route
We made it back safely, even after being attacked by the Maizsifter.
これらの功績を鑑みれば、あなたとシリウスシュガーに\n白羽の矢が立つのは、それほ:
In light of all these achievements, I would like to thank you and Sirius Sugaru
I don’t think it’s all that strange for a white-winged arrow to go off.
（シリウスシュガーだけじゃなく、\n俺のこともそんなに評価されていたのか）:
(It wasn’t just Sirius Sugaru
Did she really value me that much, too?)
それで、お引き受けいただけますか？\nお返事をきかせてください。:
So, will you accept?
Please let me hear your reply.
報酬がいいし、引き受けよう: The reward's good, so I'll take it.
困っているなら力になろう: If you're in trouble, I'll help you.
まずは%usernameusernameuserna%さんの判断を伺ってもよろし:
First, can I ask %usernameusernameuserna%san's judgment?
That said, I'm sure you and I have the same answer.
これだけの成功報酬があれば、\nシリウスシュガーの資金問題も十分に解決できそうだ:
With this much success reward,
It looks like we'll be able to solve Sirius Sugaru's financial problems well enough.
はい、そうですわね。わたくしも同じ考えですわ。\nそれに今はメイズシンドロームか:
Yes, you're right. I agree.
And now I'm getting sick from the Maze Syndrome...
他のメンバーにとっても、\n復帰直後の肩慣らしにちょうどいいと思います。:
Even for the other members,
I think it's a good way to get used to your shoulder right after your return.
俺達で力になれるなら、ぜひともやらせてほしい。\nそのプレ・クラス－Ａの子達もな:
If we can help, I'd love to.
And I can't just ignore those Pre-Class-A kids for some reason.
ふふ、なんだかんだいって、面倒見がいいのはあなたの長所ですわ。\nさすが%use:
Heehee. Being good at taking care of people is one of your strong points.
That's %usernameusernameuserna%-san for you...
わたくし達には先達として、後輩を導く使命がありますわ。\nこんな名誉な仕事、引き:
As our forerunners, we have a mission to guide our juniors.
There's no choice but to accept such an honorable job.
今、浅層以外に潜るのも、本格的な探索を行うのも、\nシリウスシュガーの皆には厳し:
Right now, diving outside of the shallows and conducting a full-scale search weren’t the same
It would be tough on everyone in Sirius Sugaru.
病み上がりのシリウスシュガーのみんなにとって、\n復帰直後の肩慣らしとしてこの仕:
For everyone in the sickly Sirius Sugaru,
This job was just the right way to get used to it right after my return.
ありがとうございます。では詳細は追って連絡しますね。: Thank you very much. I'll contact you later for the details.
俺達が生徒会室を後にしようとした時だった。: Just as we were about to leave the student council room...
──%usernameusernameuserna%さん。\nあなたは残ってくだ:
→%user name, username, user name, %-san.
You stay.
……それでは、わたくしは一足先にみんなのところへ戻っています。: ...Well then, I'll head back to the others first.
――その後、ひとり残った俺は生徒会長から、\nある『警告』を受けるのだった。:
――After that, I was left alone by the student council president.
I received a certain “warning”.
あれから少しして、プレ・クラス－Ａへの訓練が始まった。\nまずは軽く実力を見るこ:
A little while after that, training for Pre-Class-A began.
I decided to take a quick look at her abilities first...
敵だわ！ それ、総員突撃ー！\nやられる前にやっちゃえの精神よー！！:
It's the enemy! All units, charge!
Do it before you get killed!!
お、お待ちください、ジュリーさん！\nまずは有利な位置取りからだと何度も……！:
H-Hold on, Julie!
How many times do I have to tell you to get an advantage first...!?
あはははは！！ 敵がいっぱい……♪\nぜ～んぶバラバラにしてあげる！！:
Ahahaha!! There's so many enemies...♪
I'll tear you to pieces!!
あの、ノエルちゃん？ 逃げる敵まで撃たなくても……\nあと弾薬も節約して、あの…:
Um, Noel? You don't have to shoot a fleeing enemy...
Also, save some ammunition, um... Can you hear me?
ねえラウラ、仲間が戦ってるけど。\nおまえは援護とかしにいかないわけ？:
Hey, Laura, your friends are fighting.
You're not going to go back up or anything?
む、無理無理！ 無理よ～！ 最初はもっと怖くない、\nメイズシフターからお願いで:
I-I can't! It's impossible! I'm not scared at first,
Could I ask you to start with the maise shifter...?
そんな都合良く、ぽいっと用意できるか！: I can't prepare something so convenient!
な、なんだこの有様は……\nこいつらは『エース』って話じゃなかったのか！？:
Wh-What's with this situation...?
Weren’t these guys supposed to be “aces”?!
……エースであることには間違いないわ。\nただ、貴方が想像するものとは違うけど。:
...There's no doubt that he's an ace.
It’s just that it’s different from what you’re imagining.
プレ・クラス－Ａの面々はこう呼ばれてるの。\n『やらかしの』エースと。:
The members of Pre-Class-A are called this.
With the “Prankster’s” ace.
それより心香。他人事みたいに言ってるが、\n仲間のフォローに行かなくていいのか？:
More importantly, Shinka. She's saying it like it's someone else's problem, but...
Don't you need to go back up your friends?
は？ 私は自分の仕事はやっているけど？\nどうして他人分も手伝わないといけないの:
Huh? I'm doing my job.
Why do you have to help other people?
それに、仲間なんかじゃないわ。\nあんな子達と私を一緒にしないで。:
Besides, we're not friends.
Don't lump me in with those girls.
そう言い捨てると、心香はひとりでメイズシフターに向かっていく。: Saying that, Kokoka headed for the Mazeshifter by herself.
でっかいため息、聞こえてるよー。大丈夫そ？: I can hear you sighing loudly. Are you okay?
お前達で慣れてなかったら、とっくに心が折れてたところだ。: If you guys hadn't gotten used to it, I would've broken my heart by now.
じゃああたし達は、この時のためにポンコツだったわけだ。: Then that means we're all ditzes for this moment.
お前は前向きだなあ。ま、今はその元気が羨ましいよ。: You're so optimistic. Well, I'm jealous of your energy right now.
メイズで起きることは、なんでも研究の糧だもの。\n今もばりばり観察させてもらって:
Everything that happens in Maze is for research purposes.
Even now, I'm watching you closely.
研究か……そういや前にお前が書いたメイズシフター観察日記、\n読ませてもらったぞ:
Research, huh... Come to think of it, the maise shifter observation diary you wrote before,
I've read it.
おっ！ どうだった！？ かなり面白かったでしょ！？: Oh! How was it!? It was pretty interesting, wasn't it!
ああ、驚いたよ。しっかり調べられていて、\nそこから戦術や戦略の考察もあって興味:
Yeah, I'm surprised. I've been thoroughly investigated,
From there, there were considerations of tactics and strategy, so it was interesting.
でもただの妄想だから、あんま鵜呑みにしないでよ？: But it’s just a delusion, so don’t take it at face value, okay?
いや、指揮官としての俺から見ても、\nとても合理的だったと思ったけどな。:
No, even from my perspective as a commander,
I thought it was very reasonable.
おや、やけに素直にほめてくれるね。\nもしかして、あたしに惚れちゃった？:
Oh, that's quite the honest compliment.
Did she fall in love with me?
エース達の相手してたら、\nお前らのほうがよっぽどマシに思えてきてな。:
If I was up against Ace and the others...
I'm starting to think you guys are better than me.
あらら、素直じゃなくなっちゃった～。: Oh, you're not being honest anymore.
ケラケラと笑うちゆるの横で、\n俺はプレ・クラス－Ａの面々を見渡す。:
She cackles and laughs beside Yuru.
I look over the members of Pre-Class-A.
